description: Gear up for a pow day in the Men’s GORE-TEX® Lightray Ski Jacket. It combines a waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX® shell with PrimaLoft® Black Insulation ECO to keep you cozy. With just a light base layer underneath this insulated jacket, you can comfortably crush greens to double blacks from first bell to last. Cool off quickly by opening heat-dumping PitZips when the powder gets deep and things warm up, and then batten down the hatches with a helmet-compatible hood when it’s time to ride a windy lift. The RECCO® Avalanche Rescue Reflector bounces back a signal to rescuers for additional safety while skiing resorts.
name: Marmot Lightray GTX Jacket - Mens
